effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Icebound Fortitude for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.

Set: Luck of the Draw! has 2 sec increased duration.

While Luck of the Draw! is active, Death Strike costs 10 less Runic Power and can strike up to 2 additional nearby enemies.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Receive cryptic instructions from somewhere in the Twisting Nether to reveal your next task. It's probably nothing, so complete it to gain 12,865 Strength for 15 sec.  (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Use: Grasp the shard tightly to enrich yourself with crystalline energy, increasing your Mastery by 6,592 for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: The shard draws in remnant energy from defeated enemies, increasing your Mastery by 139 for 15 sec, up to 5 times.
Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

enchantments.display_string: Enchanted: Rune of the Fallen Crusader
